name: Hausmeister
description:
Warning: This game may potentially trigger epileptic seizures.

First-person horror game with random events.


You play as a janitor (called “Hausmeister” in German) who takes care of an apartment building.
The people living in the building will call you on the phone or ring your doorbell, to tell you about an issue they expirience.
You will then recieve a note, that tells you what to do.
Sometimes you have to grab the cleaning tools from the supply room, and use them.
Some other time, you will have to have a talk with one of the residents.
Among other things, you fix broken pipes, change light bulbs, mop the floor, and mow the lawn.


Everything changes, when you realize that you are being haunted by an angry spirit.
Get ready to be spooked by random ghost encounters.


You have to uncover the mystery about the old woman who lives on the top floor of the building.
Who is she? What is she?
